document_data.caption: Masakito (left) battles Takako (right).
document_data.name: Takako
document_data.mainbody: '''Takako''' was a [[human]] [[ninja]] of [[Kara-Tur]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
As a teenager, Takako disguised herself as a man and a tutor took her on as a student in the skills of the ninja. Although Takako became an expert and agile warrior, she maintained her disguise as she worried no one would hire her for dangerous missions if they found out the truth.

She once fought with the warrior [[Masakito]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1991|115|Masakito}}<ref><ref group="note">This is inferred from the art used for both characters' cards being reused from the cover of ''Night of the Seven Swords''.
document_data.Personality: Takako was a thrill-seeker who enjoyed being in any kind of danger.
